pullRequest.title: Add support for line break in array literal
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Nipuna Marcus nipunac@wso2.com
Purpose
This will add the formatting support for a line break in array literal when formatting.
Fixes #20912
Check List

nodes.bodyText: Can we merge if else blocks for CLOSING_BRACKET and CLOSING_PARENTHESIS as the two code blocks seems to be identical?
